Key Match Events: Coby White dropped 33 points, including a career-high nine three-pointers.
Zach LaVine contributed 33 points in the game.
Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago Bulls lifted Derrick Rose's jersey into the rafters next season.
The game was held on Derrick Rose Night.
The Bulls have now beaten four of the top five teams in the Eastern Conference this season.
Post-Match Reflections: Coby White and the Bulls honored Rose by winning the game.
The win picked up a huge home win for the Bulls.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls dominated the New York Knicks on Derrick Rose Night.
Karl-Anthony Towns scored 44 points and Jalen Brunson added 33 points for the Knicks.
